settings.label: Enable marker.io
settings.info: An app that allows development feedback, should be disabled on the live theme.

settings.label: Prevent redirect url parameter
settings.info: OPTIONAL: Prevent auto-redirects if URL contains this query parameter. Can be useful to resolve Google Ads issues.

settings.label: Popup link text
settings.info: Appears in the currency popup after the links

settings.content: Region data entered below should be duplicated across all stores. Enter data for every region, including this one.

settings.label: Region 1 Name
settings.info: Will be shown in region selector.

settings.label: Region 1 Code
settings.info: The internal code for this region e.g. aus or AU or asia-pacific.

settings.label: Region 1 Domain
settings.info: The full URL of the live store e.g. https://www.example.com.au

settings.label: Region 1 Country Codes
settings.info: Add a comma-separated list of country codes (in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format) that are assigned to the store. e.g. AU,NZ or US,CA or SG,MY,HK. This is used for hreflangs as well as redirect logic.

settings.label: Region 1 Currency Codes
settings.info: Add an array/list of currency codes that are assigned to the Store (in ISO 4217 format) seperated by a comma e.g. Currency List example: AFN,AMD,AZN,BHD,BDT. Note: these should match the store currencies setup on each regional store.

settings.label: Current region
settings.info: Check this box for the current store region being edited.

settings.label: Default region
settings.info: Check this box for the main/international region store ONLY.

settings.label: Region 2 Name
settings.info: Will be shown in region selector.

settings.label: Region 2 Code
settings.info: The internal code for this region e.g. aus or AU or asia-pacific.

settings.label: Region 2 Domain
settings.info: The full URL of the live store e.g. https://www.example.com.au

settings.label: Enable DigitalDarts
settings.info: Multi store hreflang tags

settings.label: Custom Shop name
settings.info: Store display name used in JSON-LD

settings.label: Logo
settings.info: 150px wide

settings.label: Map address
settings.info: Url to a google map (defaults to your address geolocation)

settings.label: Price range
settings.info: Scale of 1-5 in $ (eg. $$$)

settings.label: Use Google Merchant Center SKU format
settings.info: Uses shopify_{{ iso code }}_{{ product.id }}_{{ variant.id }} SKU format in Offers array

settings.label: Merchant Center SKU format ISO code
settings.info: Store country ISO-2 code

settings.content: To show aggregate ratings for products, you'll need a rating app and to add metafields to the product
Some global settings shared by the Product Template and the Product Modal

settings.label: Tie to shipping threshold
settings.info: If this is enabled, the price of the product must match the free shipping threshold specified in the Cart settings

settings.label: Stock availability threshold
settings.info: Displays 'Low Stock' when total available stock is less than inputted number. E.g. 10
Only affects videos uploaded as Shopify Media

settings.label: Video controls / autoplay
settings.info: Applies to both hosted (mp4) and external (YouTube) videos, but only added via the product media. Videos added via metafields will be autoplayed by default.

settings.label: Limit to shipping countries
settings.info: Hide countries you don't ship to from address forms in customer Account page.

settings.content: Toggle the full-page reveal transition animation on and off. For performance reasons, it's disabled by default.
Match the pixel values of the screen breakpoints defined in the styles so that media queries within theme sections are consistent. Shouldn't be changed once the theme styles are defined.

settings.label: Number of days before 'New In' badge expires
settings.info: Select 0 to never show the badge

settings.content: A form that will take a postcode and look within a csv file for an adjacent number for the days to deliver. Only works for either Australian postcodes on the AU store, or US zipcodes on the US store.
Text content is managed in the language settings.
Postcodes are validated on a pattern only based on the region - they are not validated as actual postcodes.

settings.label: Current Region
settings.info: This is required to use the appropriate validation for the local postcode pattern.

settings.label: First service level threshold
settings.info: Spend required to unlock free shipping for first service level

settings.content: Upsell products will be automatically displayed using the Shopify product recommendations API. You can manually define upsells by referencing upsell products via metafields on the original product.

settings.label: Minimum spend in dollars
settings.info: The minimum amount to spend to be eligible for the gift, set to 0 for no minimum.

settings.label: Limit to collection
settings.info: Only include products from this collection when calculating the minimum spend requirement.

settings.label: Limit to product
settings.info: Only include this product when calculating the minimum spend requirement. This will take precedence over collection above if both are set.

settings.content: These three trust indicators are shown throughout the theme in various layouts

settings.label: Indicator 1 link
settings.info: Optional, if left blank the item will show as content only

settings.label: Indicator 2 link
settings.info: Optional, if left blank the item will show as content only

settings.label: Indicator 3 link
settings.info: Optional, if left blank the item will show as content only

settings.label: Gift card image
settings.info: At least 850px wide

settings.label: Assign a navigation list
settings.info: Link list of URLs to preconnect to on load. Recommend a maximum of 2-3.

settings.label: Favicon image
settings.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

settings.label: Load jQuery library
settings.info: When enabled, jQuery will be loaded by the theme. For performance reasons, enable this setting if multiple instances of jQuery are being loaded by third-party apps.

settings.label: Show Okendo fit indicator
settings.info: When enabled, will render product Size / Fit indicator above 'Add to cart' button

settings.label: Site review link
settings.info: The Site review URL is built off an inactive dummy product auto created at the time of 1st site review by Okendo

settings.label: Brauz - App ID
settings.info: Unique identifier for each store locale, used to initialise BRAUZ scripts.

settings.content: See 'Checkout (Custom)' to enable rewards at checkout. You must enable and provide a store country code below to enable rewards.

settings.label: Store country code
settings.info: Two letter store code followed by country code e.g. SF-AU.

settings.label: Incremental reward amount from customer spending
Cart Recommendations profile tag
settings.info: eg cross-sell

settings.label: Enable Custom Gift Cards on checkout
